ruleResults.name: Ensure each container has a configured memory request
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Missing property object `requests.memory` - value should be within the accepted boundaries recommended by the organization

ruleResults.name: Ensure each container has a configured memory limit
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Missing property object `limits.memory` - value should be within the accepted boundaries recommended by the organization

ruleResults.name: Prevent containers from accessing host files by using high UIDs
ruleResults.messageOnFailure: Incorrect value for key `runAsUser` - value should be above 9999 to reduce the likelihood that the UID is already taken
